segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a disaster, water spilling all over like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right in it, her shoe must be drenched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so clueless, focused on that silly plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids—grubby hands in the cookie jar, contaminating all the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing precariously, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, expecting handouts—it's all so messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks filthy from use, and the floor's wet to boot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's clean and tidy, unlike this slop inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost smell the dampness and wasted cookies from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just unhygienic and careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean up this nonsense immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
